Wow you make it sound so intriguing it all makes me want to become a
histor=
ical fiction writer and stir up something for folks to read. 
There's somet=
hing about the thought of sitting for hours creating scenes
of anything I w=
ant and spend my time riding on the adventures of my
mind.  And what if, ju=
st what if the people who read what I write enjoy
the trip?  How fulfilling=
 would THAT be?

All right, where's my pen?  I'm all motivated now to get s=
ome pairing
going ^__^
